import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from '../../components/fixed/Header' import Posts from './components/posts_/Posts' import Profiles from './components/profiles/Profiles' import PostIcon from '../../components/fixed/bottom-menu/components/PostIcon' import BottomMenu from '../../components/fixed/bottom-menu/BottomMenu' export default function Home(props) { const [page, setPage] = useState('Posts') const pages = { 'Perfis': , 'Posts': } document.title = 'Home / Napker' return ( <>
{page === 'Perfis' ? 'Veja o que os seus amigos andam fazendo: ' : 'Veja usuários com os mesmos interesses que você: ' }
{pages[page]}
) }
